name: domponent
description: Build components with the HTML you already have.

scripts.build:html: node clean.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm pack && cd examples/html && npm install --force && webpack && firefox index.html
scripts.build:dev-example: node clean.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm pack && cd examples/dev-build-errors && npm install --force && webpack && firefox index.html

author: tamb
